verses.verse: וַיַּעֲשׂ֧וּ <S%H6213><s%> did בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הָרַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיִּתְּנֵ֧ם <S%H5414><s%> delivered יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> them into the hand מִדְיָ֖ן <S%H4080><s%> of Midian שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven שָׁנִֽים׃ <S%H8141><s%> years

וַתָּ֥עָז <S%H5810><s%> prevailed יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> And the hand מִדְיָ֖ן <S%H4080><s%> of Midian עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> against Israel מִפְּנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> [and] because מִדְיָ֜ן <S%H4080><s%> of the Midianites עָשֽׂוּ <S%H6213><s%> made לָהֶ֣ם ׀ בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּנְהָרוֹת֙ <S%H4492><s%> them the dens אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בֶּֽהָרִ֔ים <S%H2022><s%> which [are] in the mountains וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמְּעָר֖וֹת <S%H4631><s%> and caves וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמְּצָדֽוֹת׃ <S%H4679><s%> and strong holds

וְהָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> it was אִם־ <S%H518><s%> when זָרַ֣ע <S%H2232><s%> had sown יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> And [so] it was when Israel וְעָלָ֨ה <S%H5927><s%> came up מִדְיָ֧ן <S%H4080><s%> that the Midianites וַֽעֲמָלֵ֛ק <S%H6002><s%> and the Amalekites וּבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> and the children קֶ֖דֶם <S%H6924><s%> of the east וְעָל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> even they came up עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> against

וַיַּחֲנ֣וּ <S%H2583><s%> And they encamped עֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H5921><s%> against וַיַּשְׁחִ֙יתוּ֙ <S%H7843><s%> against them and destroyed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְב֣וּל <S%H2981><s%> the increase הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> thou בּוֹאֲךָ֖ <S%H935><s%> till thou come עַזָּ֑ה <S%H5804><s%> unto Gaza וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יַשְׁאִ֤ירוּ <S%H7604><s%> and left מִֽחְיָה֙ <S%H4241><s%> no sustenance בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> for Israel וְשֶׂ֥ה <S%H7716><s%> neither sheep וָשׁ֖וֹר <S%H7794><s%> nor ox וַחֲמֽוֹר׃ <S%H2543><s%> nor ass

כִּ֡י <S%H3588><s%> for הֵם֩ <S%H1992><s%> with וּמִקְנֵיהֶ֨ם <S%H4735><s%> with their cattle יַעֲל֜וּ <S%H5927><s%> For they came up וְאָהֳלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H168><s%> and their tents [יָבֹאוּ כ] (וּבָ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> came ק) כְדֵֽי־ <S%H1767><s%> as אַרְבֶּה֙ <S%H697><s%> grasshoppers לָרֹ֔ב <S%H7230><s%> for multitude וְלָהֶ֥ם וְלִגְמַלֵּיהֶ֖ם <S%H1581><s%> [for] both they and their camels אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> were without מִסְפָּ֑ר <S%H4557><s%> were without number וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> and they entered בָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land לְשַׁחֲתָֽהּ׃ <S%H7843><s%> to destroy

וַיִּדַּ֧ל <S%H1809><s%> impoverished יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> And Israel מְאֹ֖ד <S%H3966><s%> was greatly מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> because מִדְיָ֑ן <S%H4080><s%> of the Midianites וַיִּזְעֲק֥וּ <S%H2199><s%> cried בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD פ

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> came כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> when זָעֲק֥וּ <S%H2199><s%> cried בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And it came to pass when the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> on אֹד֥וֹת <S%H182><s%> because מִדְיָֽן׃ <S%H4080><s%> of the Midianites

וַיִּשְׁלַ֧ח <S%H7971><s%> sent יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> That the LORD אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a נָבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> prophet אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> which said לָהֶ֜ם כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> unto them Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אָנֹכִ֞י <S%H595><s%> I הֶעֱלֵ֤יתִי <S%H5927><s%> I brought you up אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> from Egypt וָאֹצִ֥יא <S%H3318><s%> and brought you forth אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מִבֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> out of the house עֲבָדִֽים׃ <S%H5650><s%> of bondage

וָאַצִּ֤ל <S%H5337><s%> And I delivered אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> מִיַּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> you out of the hand מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian וּמִיַּ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> and out of the hand כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all לֹחֲצֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H3905><s%> of all that oppressed וָאֲגָרֵ֤שׁ <S%H1644><s%> you and drave them out אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> מִפְּנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> from before וָאֶתְּנָ֥ה <S%H5414><s%> you and gave לָכֶ֖ם אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַרְצָֽם׃ <S%H776><s%> you their land

וָאֹמְרָ֣ה <S%H559><s%> And I said לָכֶ֗ם אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto you I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> your God לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִֽירְאוּ֙ <S%H3372><s%> fear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> not the gods הָאֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whose אַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> you יוֹשְׁבִ֣ים <S%H3427><s%> ye dwell בְּאַרְצָ֑ם <S%H776><s%> in whose land וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> have not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H8085><s%> but ye have not obeyed בְּקוֹלִֽי׃ <S%H6963><s%> my voice פ

וַיָּבֹ֞א <S%H935><s%> And there came מַלְאַ֣ךְ <S%H4397><s%> an angel יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיֵּ֙שֶׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> and sat תַּ֤חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הָֽאֵלָה֙ <S%H424><s%> under an oak אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּעָפְרָ֔ה <S%H6084><s%> which [was] in Ophrah אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לְיוֹאָ֖שׁ <S%H3101><s%> that [pertained] unto Joash אֲבִ֣י הָֽעֶזְרִ֑י <S%H33><s%> the Abiezrite וְגִדְע֣וֹן <S%H1439><s%> Gideon בְּנ֗וֹ <S%H1121><s%> and his son חֹבֵ֤ט <S%H2251><s%> threshed חִטִּים֙ <S%H2406><s%> wheat בַּגַּ֔ת <S%H1660><s%> by the winepress לְהָנִ֖יס <S%H5127><s%> to hide מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> [it] from מִדְיָֽן׃ <S%H4080><s%> the Midianites

וַיֵּרָ֥א <S%H7200><s%> appeared אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> about מַלְאַ֣ךְ <S%H4397><s%> And the angel יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> unto him and said אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> unto him The LORD עִמְּךָ֖ <S%H5973><s%> with גִּבּ֥וֹר <S%H1368><s%> [is] with thee thou mighty הֶחָֽיִל׃ <S%H2428><s%> man of valour

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלָ֤יו <S%H413><s%> then גִּדְעוֹן֙ <S%H1439><s%> And Gideon בִּ֣י <S%H994><s%> unto him Oh אֲדֹנִ֔י <S%H113><s%> my Lord וְיֵ֤שׁ <S%H3426><s%> if יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עִמָּ֔נוּ <S%H5973><s%> us וְלָ֥מָּה <S%H4100><s%> why מְצָאַ֖תְנוּ <S%H4672><s%> be with us why then is all this befallen כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> has all זֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> to us וְאַיֵּ֣ה <S%H346><s%> and where כָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> are all נִפְלְאֹתָ֡יו <S%H6381><s%> us? and where [be] all his miracles אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> which סִפְּרוּ־ <S%H5608><s%> told לָ֨נוּ אֲבוֹתֵ֜ינוּ <S%H1><s%> which our fathers לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> us of saying הֲלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not מִמִּצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> Egypt הֶעֱלָ֣נוּ <S%H5927><s%> bring us up יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Did not the LORD וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> henceforth נְטָשָׁ֣נוּ <S%H5203><s%> hath forsaken יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֖נוּ <S%H5414><s%> us and delivered בְּכַף־ <S%H3709><s%> us into the hands מִדְיָֽן׃ <S%H4080><s%> of the Midianites

וַיִּ֤פֶן <S%H6437><s%> looked אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> about יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> upon him and said לֵ֚ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go בְּכֹחֲךָ֣ <S%H3581><s%> in this thy might זֶ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְהוֹשַׁעְתָּ֥ <S%H3467><s%> and thou shalt save אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel מִכַּ֣ף <S%H3709><s%> from the hand מִדְיָ֑ן <S%H4080><s%> of the Midianites הֲלֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> not שְׁלַחְתִּֽיךָ׃ <S%H7971><s%> have not I sent

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> to him בִּ֣י <S%H994><s%> unto him Oh אֲדֹנָ֔י <S%H136><s%> my Lord בַּמָּ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> wherewith אוֹשִׁ֖יעַ <S%H3467><s%> shall I save אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> behold אַלְפִּי֙ <S%H504><s%> oxen הַדַּ֣ל <S%H1800><s%> [is] poor בִּמְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> in Manasseh וְאָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> and I הַצָּעִ֖יר <S%H6810><s%> and I [am] the least בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִֽי׃ <S%H1><s%> in my father's

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> But יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Surely אֶהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become עִמָּ֑ךְ <S%H5973><s%> and you וְהִכִּיתָ֥ <S%H5221><s%> unto him Surely I will be with thee and thou shalt smite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִדְיָ֖ן <S%H4080><s%> the Midianites כְּאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> as one

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If נָ֛א <S%H4994><s%> now מָצָ֥אתִי <S%H4672><s%> unto him If now I have found חֵ֖ן <S%H2580><s%> grace בְּעֵינֶ֑יךָ <S%H5869><s%> in thy sight וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ <S%H6213><s%> then shew לִּי֙ א֔וֹת <S%H226><s%> me a sign שָׁאַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> who מְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> that thou talkest עִמִּֽי׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay נָ֨א <S%H4994><s%> Please תָמֻ֤שׁ <S%H4185><s%> Depart מִזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> here עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בֹּאִ֣י <S%H935><s%> not hence I pray thee until I come אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> to וְהֹֽצֵאתִי֙ <S%H3318><s%> unto thee and bring forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִנְחָתִ֔י <S%H4503><s%> my present וְהִנַּחְתִּ֖י <S%H3240><s%> and set לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> [it] before וַיֹּאמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> thee And he said אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> I אֵשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> I will tarry עַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> until שׁוּבֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7725><s%> until thou come again

וְגִדְע֣וֹן <S%H1439><s%> And Gideon בָּ֗א <S%H935><s%> went in וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> and made ready גְּדִֽי־ <S%H1423><s%> kid עִזִּים֙ <S%H5795><s%> goat וְאֵיפַת־ <S%H374><s%> of an ephah קֶ֣מַח <S%H7058><s%> of flour מַצּ֔וֹת <S%H4682><s%> and unleavened cakes הַבָּשָׂר֙ <S%H1320><s%> the flesh שָׂ֣ם <S%H7760><s%> he put בַּסַּ֔ל <S%H5536><s%> in a basket וְהַמָּרַ֖ק <S%H4839><s%> the broth שָׂ֣ם <S%H7760><s%> and he put בַּפָּר֑וּר <S%H6517><s%> in a pot וַיּוֹצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> and brought [it] out אֵלָ֛יו <S%H413><s%> about אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הָאֵלָ֖ה <S%H424><s%> unto him under the oak וַיַּגַּֽשׁ׃ <S%H5066><s%> and presented ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> about מַלְאַ֣ךְ <S%H4397><s%> And the angel הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> of God קַ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> unto him Take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבָּשָׂ֤ר <S%H1320><s%> the flesh וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּצּוֹת֙ <S%H4682><s%> and the unleavened cakes וְהַנַּח֙ <S%H3240><s%> and lay אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַסֶּ֣לַע <S%H5553><s%> rock הַלָּ֔ז <S%H1975><s%> [them] upon this וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמָּרַ֖ק <S%H4839><s%> the broth שְׁפ֑וֹךְ <S%H8210><s%> and pour out וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he did כֵּֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> so

וַיִּשְׁלַ֞ח <S%H7971><s%> put forth מַלְאַ֣ךְ <S%H4397><s%> Then the angel יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קְצֵ֤ה <S%H7097><s%> the end הַמִּשְׁעֶ֙נֶת֙ <S%H4938><s%> of the staff אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> that was בְּיָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> that [was] in his hand וַיִּגַּ֥ע <S%H5060><s%> and touched בַּבָּשָׂ֖ר <S%H1320><s%> the flesh וּבַמַּצּ֑וֹת <S%H4682><s%> and the unleavened cakes וַתַּ֨עַל <S%H5927><s%> and there rose up הָאֵ֜שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַצּ֗וּר <S%H6697><s%> out of the rock וַתֹּ֤אכַל <S%H398><s%> and consumed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבָּשָׂר֙ <S%H1320><s%> the flesh וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּצּ֔וֹת <S%H4682><s%> and the unleavened cakes וּמַלְאַ֣ךְ <S%H4397><s%> Then the angel יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הָלַ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> departed מֵעֵינָֽיו׃ <S%H5869><s%> out of his sight

וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> perceived גִּדְע֔וֹן <S%H1439><s%> And when Gideon כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מַלְאַ֥ךְ <S%H4397><s%> that he [was] an angel יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he ס וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said גִּדְע֗וֹן <S%H1439><s%> Gideon אֲהָהּ֙ <S%H162><s%> Alas אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> O Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> for because רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> I have seen מַלְאַ֣ךְ <S%H4397><s%> an angel יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD פָּנִ֖ים <S%H6440><s%> face אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פָּנִֽים׃ <S%H6440><s%> to face

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said ל֧וֹ יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD שָׁל֥וֹם <S%H7965><s%> unto him Peace לְךָ֖ אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָ֑א <S%H3372><s%> [be] unto thee fear לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תָּמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> not thou shalt not die

וַיִּבֶן֩ <S%H1129><s%> built שָׁ֨ם <S%H8033><s%> there גִּדְע֤וֹן <S%H1439><s%> Then Gideon מִזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H4196><s%> an altar לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> there unto the LORD וַיִּקְרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> and called ל֥וֹ יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD שָׁל֑וֹם <S%H7965><s%> is Peace עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto this day הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> to this עוֹדֶ֕נּוּ <S%H5750><s%> is still בְּעָפְרָ֖ת <S%H6084><s%> it [is] yet in Ophrah אֲבִ֥י הָעֶזְרִֽי׃ <S%H33><s%> of the Abiezrites פ

וַיְהִי֮ <S%H1961><s%> become בַּלַּ֣יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> And it came to pass the same night הַהוּא֒ <S%H1931><s%> the same וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said ל֣וֹ יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD קַ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> unto him Take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פַּר־ <S%H6499><s%> young הַשּׁוֹר֙ <S%H7794><s%> bullock אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לְאָבִ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> thy father's וּפַ֥ר <S%H6499><s%> bullock הַשֵּׁנִ֖י <S%H8145><s%> even the second שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> of seven שָׁנִ֑ים <S%H8141><s%> years old וְהָרַסְתָּ֗ <S%H2040><s%> and throw down אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִזְבַּ֤ח <S%H4196><s%> the altar הַבַּ֙עַל֙ <S%H1168><s%> of Baal אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לְאָבִ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> that thy father וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֲשֵׁרָ֥ה <S%H842><s%> the grove אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> is beside תִּכְרֹֽת׃ <S%H3772><s%> hath and cut down

וּבָנִ֨יתָ <S%H1129><s%> And build מִזְבֵּ֜חַ <S%H4196><s%> an altar לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> on רֹ֧אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> upon the top הַמָּע֛וֹז <S%H4581><s%> of this rock הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> of this בַּמַּֽעֲרָכָ֑ה <S%H4634><s%> in the ordered place וְלָֽקַחְתָּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> and take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפָּ֣ר <S%H6499><s%> bullock הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> the second וְהַעֲלִ֣יתָ <S%H5927><s%> and offer עוֹלָ֔ה <S%H5930><s%> a burnt sacrifice בַּעֲצֵ֥י <S%H6086><s%> with the wood הָאֲשֵׁרָ֖ה <S%H842><s%> of the grove אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which תִּכְרֹֽת׃ <S%H3772><s%> which thou shalt cut down

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> took גִּדְע֜וֹן <S%H1439><s%> Then Gideon עֲשָׂרָ֤ה <S%H6235><s%> ten אֲנָשִׁים֙ <S%H376><s%> men מֵֽעֲבָדָ֔יו <S%H5650><s%> of his servants וַיַּ֕עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> and did כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> and because דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> had said אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> as יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD וַיְהִ֡י <S%H1961><s%> to him כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> and because יָרֵא֩ <S%H3372><s%> unto him and [so] it was because he feared אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֨ית <S%H1004><s%> household אָבִ֜יו <S%H1><s%> his father's וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> and the men הָעִ֛יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city מֵעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> that he could not do יוֹמָ֖ם <S%H3119><s%> [it] by day וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> that he did לָֽיְלָה׃ <S%H3915><s%> [it] by night

וַיַּשְׁכִּ֜ימוּ <S%H7925><s%> arose early אַנְשֵׁ֤י <S%H376><s%> the men הָעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> of the city בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> behold נֻתַּץ֙ <S%H5422><s%> was cast down מִזְבַּ֣ח <S%H4196><s%> behold the altar הַבַּ֔עַל <S%H1168><s%> of Baal וְהָאֲשֵׁרָ֥ה <S%H842><s%> and the grove אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> was beside כֹּרָ֑תָה <S%H3772><s%> was cut down וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> הַפָּ֣ר <S%H6499><s%> bullock הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> that [was] by it and the second הֹֽעֲלָ֔ה <S%H5927><s%> was offered עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> was beside הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar הַבָּנֽוּי׃ <S%H1129><s%> [that was] built

וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> And they said אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about רֵעֵ֔הוּ <S%H7453><s%> to another מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> Who עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> Who hath done הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this וַֽיִּדְרְשׁוּ֙ <S%H1875><s%> ask וַיְבַקְשׁ֔וּ <S%H1245><s%> and asked וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> they said גִּדְעוֹן֙ <S%H1439><s%> Gideon בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יוֹאָ֔שׁ <S%H3101><s%> of Joash עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> hath done הַדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> thing הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וַיֹּ֨אמְר֜וּ <S%H559><s%> said אַנְשֵׁ֤י <S%H376><s%> the men הָעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> of the city אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> unto יוֹאָ֔שׁ <S%H3101><s%> unto Joash הוֹצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> Bring out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּנְךָ֖ <S%H1121><s%> thy son וְיָמֹ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> that he may die כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> and indeed נָתַץ֙ <S%H5422><s%> because he hath cast down אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִזְבַּ֣ח <S%H4196><s%> the altar הַבַּ֔עַל <S%H1168><s%> of Baal וְכִ֥י <S%H3588><s%> and indeed כָרַ֖ת <S%H3772><s%> and because he hath cut down הָאֲשֵׁרָ֥ה <S%H842><s%> the grove אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> was beside

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יוֹאָ֡שׁ <S%H3101><s%> And Joash לְכֹל֩ <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who עָמְד֨וּ <S%H5975><s%> unto all that stood עָלָ֜יו <S%H5921><s%> against הַאַתֶּ֣ם ׀ <S%H859><s%> will you תְּרִיב֣וּן <S%H7378><s%> against him Will ye plead לַבַּ֗עַל <S%H1168><s%> Baal אִם־ <S%H518><s%> or אַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> will you תּוֹשִׁיע֣וּן <S%H3467><s%> deliver אוֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> Whoever יָרִ֥יב <S%H7378><s%> him? he that will plead ל֛וֹ יוּמַ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> for him let him be put to death עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> by הַבֹּ֑קֶר <S%H1242><s%> whilst [it is yet] morning אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> if he [be] a god הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> him יָ֣רֶב <S%H7378><s%> let him plead ל֔וֹ כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> because נָתַ֖ץ <S%H5422><s%> for himself because [one] hath cast down אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> מִזְבְּחֽוֹ׃ <S%H4196><s%> his altar

וַיִּקְרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> he called ל֥וֹ בַיּוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> Therefore on that day הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> him יְרֻבַּ֣עַל <S%H3378><s%> him Jerubbaal לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying יָ֤רֶב <S%H7378><s%> plead בּוֹ֙ הַבַּ֔עַל <S%H1168><s%> Let Baal כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> because נָתַ֖ץ <S%H5422><s%> against him because he hath thrown down אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> מִזְבְּחֽוֹ׃ <S%H4196><s%> his altar פ

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִדְיָ֧ן <S%H4080><s%> Then all the Midianites וַעֲמָלֵ֛ק <S%H6002><s%> and the Amalekites וּבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> and the children קֶ֖דֶם <S%H6924><s%> of the east נֶאֶסְפ֣וּ <S%H622><s%> were gathered יַחְדָּ֑ו <S%H3162><s%> together וַיַּעַבְר֥וּ <S%H5674><s%> and went over וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְּעֵ֥מֶק <S%H6010><s%> in the valley יִזְרְעֶֽאל׃ <S%H3157><s%> of Jezreel

וְר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> But the Spirit יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לָבְשָׁ֖ה <S%H3847><s%> came אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גִּדְע֑וֹן <S%H1439><s%> upon Gideon וַיִּתְקַע֙ <S%H8628><s%> and he blew בַּשּׁוֹפָ֔ר <S%H7782><s%> a trumpet וַיִּזָּעֵ֥ק <S%H2199><s%> was gathered אֲבִיעֶ֖זֶר <S%H44><s%> and Abiezer אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <S%H310><s%> after

וּמַלְאָכִים֙ <S%H4397><s%> messengers שָׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> And he sent בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> throughout מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> throughout all Manasseh וַיִּזָּעֵ֥ק <S%H2199><s%> who also was gathered גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אַחֲרָ֑יו <S%H310><s%> after וּמַלְאָכִ֣ים <S%H4397><s%> messengers שָׁלַ֗ח <S%H7971><s%> him and he sent בְּאָשֵׁ֤ר <S%H836><s%> unto Asher וּבִזְבֻלוּן֙ <S%H2074><s%> and unto Zebulun וּבְנַפְתָּלִ֔י <S%H5321><s%> and unto Naphtali וַֽיַּעֲל֖וּ <S%H5927><s%> and they came up לִקְרָאתָֽם׃ <S%H7125><s%> to meet

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said גִּדְע֖וֹן <S%H1439><s%> And Gideon אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> unto God אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If יֶשְׁךָ֞ <S%H3426><s%> If thou wilt מוֹשִׁ֧יעַ <S%H3467><s%> save בְּיָדִ֛י <S%H3027><s%> by mine hand אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> you דִּבַּֽרְתָּ׃ <S%H1696><s%> as thou hast said

הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> behold אָנֹכִ֗י <S%H595><s%> I מַצִּ֛יג <S%H3322><s%> Behold I will put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גִּזַּ֥ת <S%H1492><s%> a fleece הַצֶּ֖מֶר <S%H6785><s%> of wool בַּגֹּ֑רֶן <S%H1637><s%> in the floor אִ֡ם <S%H518><s%> If טַל֩ <S%H2919><s%> [and] if the dew יִהְיֶ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַגִּזָּ֜ה <S%H1492><s%> be on the fleece לְבַדָּ֗הּ <S%H905><s%> only וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> upon all the earth חֹ֔רֶב <S%H2721><s%> only and [it be] dry וְיָדַעְתִּ֗י <S%H3045><s%> [beside] then shall I know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that תוֹשִׁ֧יעַ <S%H3467><s%> that thou wilt save בְּיָדִ֛י <S%H3027><s%> by mine hand אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> you דִּבַּֽרְתָּ׃ <S%H1696><s%> as thou hast said

וַיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> and it was כֵ֕ן <S%H3651><s%> so וַיַּשְׁכֵּם֙ <S%H7925><s%> And it was so for he rose up early מִֽמָּחֳרָ֔ת <S%H4283><s%> on the morrow וַיָּ֖זַר <S%H2115><s%> together אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַגִּזָּ֑ה <S%H1492><s%> the fleece וַיִּ֤מֶץ <S%H4680><s%> and wringed טַל֙ <S%H2919><s%> the dew מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַגִּזָּ֔ה <S%H1492><s%> out of the fleece מְל֥וֹא <S%H4393><s%> full הַסֵּ֖פֶל <S%H5602><s%> a bowl מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> of water

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said גִּדְעוֹן֙ <S%H1439><s%> And Gideon אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> unto God אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יִ֤חַר <S%H2734><s%> be hot אַפְּךָ֙ <S%H639><s%> Let not thine anger בִּ֔י וַאֲדַבְּרָ֖ה <S%H1696><s%> against me and I will speak אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> also הַפָּ֑עַם <S%H6471><s%> but this once אֲנַסֶּ֤ה <S%H5254><s%> let me prove נָּא־ <S%H4994><s%> please רַק־ <S%H7535><s%> but הַפַּ֙עַם֙ <S%H6471><s%> I pray thee but this once בַּגִּזָּ֔ה <S%H1492><s%> with the fleece יְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> become נָ֨א <S%H4994><s%> now חֹ֤רֶב <S%H2721><s%> let it now be dry אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on הַגִּזָּה֙ <S%H1492><s%> only upon the fleece לְבַדָּ֔הּ <S%H905><s%> only וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and upon all the ground יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become טָּֽל׃ <S%H2919><s%> let there be dew

וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> And God כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> so בַּלַּ֣יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> so that night הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וַיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> it was חֹ֤רֶב <S%H2721><s%> for it was dry אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on הַגִּזָּה֙ <S%H1492><s%> upon the fleece לְבַדָּ֔הּ <S%H905><s%> only וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> was on כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> on all the ground הָ֥יָה <S%H1961><s%> become טָֽל׃ <S%H2919><s%> only and there was dew פ
